title: jayamuNDu bhayamillai
sahitya:
jayamuNDu bhayamillai manamE inda janmattilE viDudalaiyuNDu nilaiyuNDu
anupallavi

 bhayamuNDu bhaktiyinAlE nenjil padivuTra kulashakti sharaNuNDu paghaiyillai

caraNam 1

 bhayamuNDu kunrattaip-pOlE shakti porp-pAda munDadan mElE 
niyamamellAm shakti ninaivanrip-piridillai neriyuNDu kuriyuNDu kula shakti veriyuNDu
   
caraNam 2

 matiyuNDu shelvangaL shErkkum deiva valiyuNDu tImaiyaip-pOkkum
vidhiyuNDu tozhilukku viLaivuNDu kuraivillai vicanappoik-kaDaluk-kumaran kaik-kaNaiyuNDu
   
caraNam 3

 alaipaTTa kaDalukku mElE shakti aruLenum dONiyinAlE
 tolayoTTik-karaiyuTrut-tuyaraTru viDupaTTut-tuNiyuTra kula shakti caraNattil muDidoTTu
